### Part 1: Outline maps

## US map

```{r}
usa <- map_data(map = "state") # loads data for us map

us_missouri <- map_data(map = "state", 
                        region = "missouri") # loads missouri data. 
us_other <- subset(x = usa, subset = region %in% c("alabama", 
                                                   "florida", 
                                                   "mississippi", 
                                                   "north carolina"))
```
